mapper.select: SELECT report.*, report_file.* FROM report JOIN report_file ON (report.report_no = report_file.report_no)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_report (room_no, user_no, report_check1, report_check2, report_check3, report_content, use_at, agree_at) VALUES (#{roomNo}, 1, #{reportCheck1}, #{reportCheck2}, #{reportCheck3}, #{reportContent}, "Y", #{agreeAt})
